Maintenance Training Program Bulldozer Operation The Bulldozer Operation course aims to equip trainees with the knowledge and skills required to meet the standards required of the test level. General knowledge of the bulldozer Daily inspection and weekly maintenance of the bulldozer Pre-start and shut-down procedures Manoeuvre and park the plant through the bulldozer test circuit and park the plant in designated positions Mark out the boundary of the trench according to the drawing Good practices for backfilling, travelling and loading excavated materials onto vehicles Post operation procedure Please refer to Course Fees & Registration for more details on the bulldozer operator course fees, duration and registration. Applicants are required to make payments exclusively to the company's designated bank account and obtain an official receipt.
